Mohamed Zouaoui (Arabic: محمد الزواوي), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a mụrụ na Tunisia nke bi na Ịtali
N'afọ 2004, ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya na telivishọn, nweta ọrụ mbụ ya na miniseries TV Posso chiamarti amore?
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Nassiryia - Per non dimensicare (Nasiriyah - Ka anyị ghara ichefu), Capri, na RIS Delitti Imperfetti (Scientific Investigations Unit: Imperfect Crimes)
N'afọ 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na miniseries Liberi di giocare
Ihe nkiri izizi ya bụ ihe nkiri afọ 2008 L'ultimo pulcinella, nke Maurizio Scapparo duziri
N'afọ 2009, ọ pụtara na I mostri oggi, n'afọ 2010 pụtara na The Father and the Foreigner
N'afọ 2010 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na I fiori di Kirkuk, nke Fariborz Kamkari duziri
Maka ọrụ a, o nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere "Golden Globe" 2011 Globo d'Oro maka Best New Actor.
N'afọ 2012, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri onwe ya Carta Bianca, nke onye nduzi Colombian Andreas Maldonado, ihe nkiri dabeere na akụkọ eziokwu.
N'etiti afọ 2014 na 2016 Zouaoui na-ekere òkè n'ọtụtụ ọrụ gụnyere, Movies, obere ihe nkiri, na usoro TV.
N'afọ 2018 o sonyere na ihe nkiri Beirut, nke Brad Anderson duziri na Jon Hamm nakwa Rosamund Pike
Ihe nkiri ahụ gosipụtara na Sundance Film Festival afọ 2018 na Jenụwarị 22.

N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ bụ onye isi ihe nkiri Italian-Moroccan Catharsys maọbụbụ The Afina Tales of the Lost World, nke e gosipụtara na asọmpi n'ọtụtụ mmemme dị mkpa gụnyere Turin Film Festival na Marrakech International Film Festival.
N'afọ 2019 ya na Claudia Gerini gbara ihe nkiri Burraco Fatale nke Giuliana Gamba.
